content: on half_double_crochet into each of the first 13sts work 2hdc into the next st *half_double_crochet into each of the next 13sts work 2hdc into the next st repeat from * once more join as above 45sts round 4 ch1 not a st from now on half_double_crochet into each of the first 14sts work 2hdc into the next st *half_double_crochet into each of the next 14sts work 2hdc into the next st repeat from * once more join as above 48sts round 5 ch1 not a st from now on half_double_crochet into each of the first 15sts work 2hdc into the next st *half_double_crochet into each of the next 15sts work 2hdc into the next st repeat from * once more join as above 51sts round 6 ch1 not a st from now on half_double_crochet into each of the first 16sts work 2hdc into the next st *half_double_crochet into each of the next 16sts work 2hdc into the next st repeat from * once more join as above 54sts rnds 7 12 or until dress is desired length ch1 half_double_crochet into each st around join 54sts fasten_off and hide loose ends lace layer holding the dress upside down attach black yarn to first unworked front loop from round one of the bodice at the back of the dress begin by working a round of loose sl sts into each of the unworked front loops around 36 sl sts round 1 ch1 single_crochet into first slip_stitch ch4 skip the next slip_stitch *single_crochet into the next slip_stitch ch4 skip the next slip_stitch repeat from * around join last chain to the first st with a slip_stitch 18sts & 18 ch4 spaces round 2 slip_stitch into each of the first 2chs ch1 single_crochet into the centre of the first ch4 space *ch4 skip 2ch single_crochet 2ch and single_crochet into the middle of the next ch4 space ch4 repeat from * around join as before 18sts & 18 ch4 spaces rnds 3 8 or until lace comfortably stretches to the base without distorting the under skirt slip_stitch into each of the first 2chs ch1 single_crochet into the first ch4 space *ch4 skip 2ch single_crochet 2ch and single_crochet into the middle of the next ch4 space ch4 repeat from * around join as before 18sts & 18 ch4 spaces round 9 ch1 slip_stitch into the first st and through the st at the base of the underskirt behind it as pictured this will anchor the overskirt into position work 6sc into the first ch4 space *slip_stitch into the next st and skipping 2sts on the underskirt behind it from the last slip_stitch you worked through the corresponding st behind it work 6sc into the next ch4 space repeat from * around joining last st to first slip_stitch with a slip_stitch 108sts & 18 sl sts fasten_off and hide loose ends sleeves attach yarn beneath the sleeve hole on the bodice you will have 6 skipped stitches over the bottom and 8 chains to work through across
